| History                 = The Four Winds is a global crime syndicate with 20,000 members, an  organization that is structured like a corporation with a board.{{r|Agent X Vol 1 5}} It's original 4 leaders were assassinated by [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]]. It was active in Kobe ([[Japan]]), but expanded or relocated operations to [[New York City]], United States.{{r|Deadpool Vol 3 65}} [[Higashi (Earth-616)|Higashi]] inherited the syndicate.

The organization is involved in real estate development in the northeastern U.S., forcibly evicting people.{{r|Agent X Vol 1 1}} Recently the [[Anthony Masters (Earth-616)|Taskmaster]], [[James Burley (Earth-616)|Agent X]], and [[Inez Temple (Earth-616)|Outlaw]] defeated the syndicate's men and the half-dozen supervillains they hired.{{r|Agent X Vol 1 6}}
